name: ⛺️ Server.Camp
desc: Friendly SaaS hosting of popular open-source software tools for startups and small companies, built by developers.

name: 📊 Wakapi
desc: A minimalistic, self-hosted WakaTime-compatible backend for coding statistics written in Go.

name: 🐳 MailWhale
desc: A bring-your-own-SMTP-server mail relay with REST API and web UI, built with Go and Svelte.

name: 🤖 Telepush
desc: A simple Telegram Bot to translate POST requests with JSON payload into Telegram push messages. Written in Go.

name: ⚓️ Anchr.io
desc: A toolbox service for maintaining bookmark collections, shortening links and uploading and sharing images encryptedly.

name: ✏️ MiniNote
desc: A simple, persistent, self-hosted Markdown note-taking app built with VueJS.

name: 🚙 tafviz
desc: Simple, browser-based 2D BEV visualization of traffic scenarios in TAF-BW and INTERACTION dataset format in 350 lines of JavaScript

name: 🌐 pyquadkey2
desc: Cython implementation of geographical tiling using QuadKeys
